news.title: 3D-Aware Vision-Language Models Paper Accepted
news.content: The paper "3D-Aware Vision-Language Models Fine-Tuning with Geometric Distillation" is accepted to EMNLP 2025 Findings.

news.title: IOT Paper Selected for Oral Presentation
news.content: The paper "I0T: Embedding Standardization Method Towards Zero Modality Gap" has been selected as oral presentation in ACL 2025!

news.title: Paper Accepted at ACL 2025
news.content: We have a paper accepted in ACL 2025.

news.title: 3 Papers Accepted to CVPR 2025
news.content: 3 papers accepted to CVPR 2025.

news.title: 2 Papers Accepted to ICLR 2025
news.content: 2 papers accepted to ICLR 2025.

news.title: Label-Augmented Dataset Distillation Oral at WACV 2025
news.content: The paper "Label-Augmented Dataset Distillation" has been selected as oral presentation in WACV 2025.

news.title: Image Hallucination Paper Oral at AAAI 2025
news.content: The paper "Evaluating Image Hallucination in Text-to-Image Generation with Question-Answering" has been selected as oral presentation in AAAI 2025.

news.title: AAAI 2025 Paper Accepted
news.content: The paper "Evaluating Image Hallucination in Text-to-Image Generation with Question-Answering" is accepted to AAAI 2025.

news.title: NeurIPS 2024 Paper Accepted
news.content: The paper "Understanding Multi-Granularity for Open-Vocabulary Part Segmentation" is accepted to NeurIPS 2024.

news.title: WACV 2025 Paper Accepted
news.content: The paper "Label-Augmented Dataset Distillation" is accepted to WACV 2025.

news.title: ECCV 2024 Oral Presentation
news.content: The paper "Rethinking Data Augmentation for Robust LiDAR Semantic Segmentation in Adverse Weather" has been selected as oral presentation in ECCV 2024.

news.title: Prof. Shim Program Chair of ACCV 2026
news.content: Prof. Shim will serve as Program Chair of ACCV 2026.

news.title: ECCV and IROS 2024 Papers Accepted
news.content: We have three papers accepted in ECCV 2024 and one paper accepted in IROS 2024.

news.title: AAAI 2024 Paper Accepted
news.content: The paper "Weakly Supervised Semantic Segmentation for Driving Scenes" is accepted to Association for the Advancement of Artificial Intelligence (AAAI).

news.title: PAMI Paper Accepted
news.content: The paper "Saliency as Pseudo-pixel Supervision for Weakly and Semi-supervised Semantic Segmentation" is accepted to IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence (PAMI, IF=24.31).

news.title: PhD Graduations
news.content: Youngjun and Kyungjune have granted Ph.D degree and has graduated SIT, Yonsei.

news.title: PAMI Paper on Font Generation
news.content: The paper "Few-shot Font Generation with Weakly Supervised Localized Representations" is accepted to IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence (PAMI, IF=16.39).

news.title: Lab Moved to KAIST AI
news.content: News. We moved to the The Kim Jaechul Graduate School of AI at KAIST (KAIST 김재철 AI 대학원). If you are interested in joining our lab, you should apply to the graduate program at KAIST AI.

news.title: Dr. Junsuk Choe Joins Sogang University
news.content: Good news. Dr. Junsuk Choe starts his new career at Sogang University (Computer Science and Engineering) as a faculty member. Congratulation!

news.title: Junsuk Choe PhD Graduation
news.content: Congratulations! Junsuk Choe has granted Ph.D degree and has graduated SIT, Yonsei.
